statements: DELETE FROM HazardousMaterialsDisposalRecord WHERE material_name = 'Acid' AND disposal_date = '2022-08-15';
DELETE FROM HazardousMaterialsDisposalRecord WHERE quantity > 100 AND regulations_met = TRUE;
DELETE FROM HazardousMaterialsDisposalRecord WHERE disposal_method = 'Incineration' AND material_name = 'Acid' AND disposal_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM HazardousMaterialsRecords WHERE record_id = 100 AND material_name = 'Acid';
DELETE FROM disposal_locations WHERE location_name = 'Trash Dump';
DELETE FROM regulations WHERE regulatory_body = 'EPA' AND regulation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM disposal_companies WHERE location = 'City Center';
DELETE FROM waste_disposal_records WHERE compliance_status = false;
DELETE FROM MaterialRegulations WHERE material_id = 1 AND regulation_id = 3;
